participant_1.name: Ethan Carter
participant_1.personality: Creative, ambitious, and passionate about gaming.
participant_1.background: I design video games for a living. My wife recently got laid off from her human resources job. My son plays on the local football team. I have been on the design team for over 65 video games. I am trying to create my own startup company in the gaming industry.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Laid-back, outdoorsy, and a fan of country music.
participant_2.background: I love country music. I drive a big truck. I like to go hunting. I like football on tv.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
Oh, that's cool. I'm a video game designer.
Really? What games have you worked on?
I've worked on a lot of games. Some of the most popular ones are Call of Duty, World of Warcraft, and Grand Theft Auto.
Wow! Those are some big games.
Yeah, they are. I've been really lucky to be able to work on such amazing projects.
What's it like to be a video game designer?
It's a lot of fun! I get to come up with new ideas and create worlds that people can explore.
That sounds really cool. I'm not sure I could ever do something like that.
It's not as hard as you might think. You just need to have a good imagination and be able to tell a story.
I guess I could give it a try.
You should! I think you'd be great at it.
Thanks for the vote of confidence. I'll have to think about it.
Sure. Let me know if you have any questions.
